Articles.Content:
Alright, the Kerbin armed forces are giving away free destroyer parts, for a grand race! Bobbley Kerman won in 1589 in the Karribean Schooner, and is men hiked to their destination. This year\'s destination is tricky, and I\'ll get to that now. You are going from KSC to the tip of the southern pole! 

Rules:

1. Must make it to the absolute tip.

2. NO PLANES, NO ROCKETS!

3. Must have a boat, and land vehicle to get there. (From expierience, it is easier to use one big vehicle)

4. May use any mods

5. Have fun!

Person with the fastest time wins. Must contain video, and or, and extreme amount of pics

Good luck!

Leaderboards:
Thanks, but no thanks, my computer could not handle the lag anyway.
Lag? All you have to do is make a vehicle. Doesn\'t say it has to be big...

> 
> Lag? All you have to do is make a vehicle. Doesn\'t say it has to be big...

specs in attachment :/

NOW do you get it?

Boats are very hard to do. If they are slightly above the water they\'ll keep splashing down causing hell.

A sub on the other hand...
They aren\'t hard, with new runway. I made one that got across.
Oh btw twinky how did you like my koncord?
Hmm... Looking at the specs... I shall build a rocket! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Hmm... Looking at the specs... I shall build a rocket! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

?

(also if you look in the make a passenger plane contest you will find my koncord, if you wanna see it. it actually can go 700 M/S).

I\'m off, 7 - 8 ms^-1. It is very boring...

He didn\'t rule out use of a rocket.

\*EDIT\* Lost an engine. Back to base.

> 
> I\'m off, 7 - 8 ms^-1. It is very boring...
> 
> He didn\'t rule out use of a rocket.
> 
> \*EDIT\* Lost an engine. Back to base.

Wait, 7-8 ms? ???

i wa sgoing 200 M/S on takeoff, so idk what you are saying. also how did you lose an engine?!

> 
> Wait, 7-8 ms? ???
> 
> i wa sgoing 200 M/S on takeoff, so idk what you are saying. also how did you lose an engine?!

The boat race thing. Not the Concorde thing.

In other news MKII is on a roll.
